data.title: Jeremy Sisto Dated Reese Witherspoon? See More Surprising Couples
data.meta_description: The Clueless and Wicked City actor made his comments in a Reddit AMA chat
data.text:
Elle Woods and Elton?

Jeremy Sisto confirmed a little-known rumor during his Reddit AMA chat this week when he revealed he used to date none other than Reese Witherspoon. The two were co-stars in the 1992 TV movie Desperate Choices: To Save My Child.

"She was my first actress girlfriend," said Sisto, 41. "We had a long distance relationship for a long time. I was so into her. Then she went to Africa to do a movie and I guess I thought she had broken up with me because she didn't call that much, so I moved on and met my ex-wife Marisa. When she returned, I found out that wasn't her intention but i had already gotten involved. Felt badly. She's a great person."

Witherspoon, 39, declined to comment.
